properties.description: First example on how to use built-in sql serverless pool

content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://devindatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/synw-personal-storage/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


SELECT
    TOP 5 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://devindatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/synw-personal-storage/player_data.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
